Entry.JapaneseText: いいって事よ！ 済んだ事は ウダウダ言わない性分だって言ったろ？
Entry.EnglishText: It's all good! Haven't I said that I'm not the kind of guy to go on about things that are said and done?

Entry.JapaneseText: でも毒キノコを入れたのは 事実だよネ？
Entry.EnglishText: But you <Italics>did<NoItalics> put poisonous mushrooms in our food, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: まだ言うか!? おれ、泣いちゃうぞー！
Entry.EnglishText: You're still going on about that?! You're gonna make me cry!
